byline.contributor: James Kanter reported from Brussels, and Stanley Reed from London.
byline.original: By JAMES KANTER and STANLEY REED

abstract: European Commission says its proposal to accelerate efforts to creat energy union is important step toward unifying European Union countries and reducing dependency on Russian natural gas; proposal's most serious challenge overcoming fact that bloc's countries zealously guard their control over national energy systems.
lead_paragraph: The European Commission vowed to accelerate efforts to knit together diverse national energy systems amid deepening tensions with Russia.

headline.main: European Leaders Seek Tighter Cooperation on Energy
headline.print_headline: European Leaders Seek Tighter Cooperation on Energy

snippet: The European Commission vowed to accelerate efforts to knit together diverse national energy systems amid deepening tensions with Russia.
